# displayedComponents

**Instance Property**

The date components that the user is able to view and edit.

## Declaration

```swift
var displayedComponents: DatePickerComponents
```

## Labeling the date picker

- **label**: A description of the `DatePicker`.
- **DatePickerStyleConfiguration.Label**: A type-erased label of a `DatePicker`.
title: displayedComponents
